Title: Direct the division of veterans services to conduct a study on converting the division of veterans services to an administrative agency independent of the executive department
Summary: Directs the division of veterans' services to conduct a study on converting the division of veterans' services to an administrative agency independent of the executive department.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to directing the division of veterans' services to conduct a study on converting the division of veterans' services to an administrative agency independent of the executive department; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
